EmailTemplate.name: Notify Underwriting on Quote Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: RFP/RFR has been Approved & Quote Object Created - {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c} {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
U/W has approved the RFP/RFR Form: {!Proposal__c.RFP_Form__c} for {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c}, {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} and Quote {!Proposal__c.Name} has been generated. Please review and attach quotes.
Thank you.
